p: NF-κB is generally regarded as being anti-apoptotic. Yet, in certain contexts, NF-κB may as well act as a promotor of apoptosis, especially in response to cellular stress [ 70, 71]. To test whether apoptosis was a biological process with significance to OmEO treatment-related effects, apoptosis was investigated using a specific cell death detection ELISA assay, as was previously demonstrated [ 72, 73, 74].
